name: ReflectoLabs Inc
description:
Here at ReflectoLabs Inc we've been using our government funding to look into self reflection - but none of that psychology mumbo-jumbo which we don't understand! We've made literal Mirror Images™ which reflect your past actions. You, willing guinea pig volunteer, will help us determine how well humans can plan for the future and reflect on past actions. We need you to run our (mostly safe) obstacle course to test the accuracy and responsiveness of our new technology! Good luck! (you're gonna need it...)

Ketziel

  • Game Design
  • Graphic Design
